title: The 2025 gift guide for journalists
description: Stumped on what to get the journalist in your life this year? You’re bound to find something that works below — whether the person’s true passion is interviewing, caffeinating, or snuggling. Write An elevated reporter’s notebook (x2) I’ve been using Field Notes notebooks for years; their size is perfect for slipping into a pocket, and...
